title: TRTN Makes Bullish Cross Above Critical Moving Average - Nasdaq.com
text: In trading on Thursday, shares of Triton International Ltd (Symbol: TRTN) crossed above their 200 day moving average of $32.36, changing hands as high as $33.05 per share. Triton International Ltd shares are currently trading up about 3.8% on the day. The chart below shows the one year performance of TRTN shares, versus its 200 day moving average:     Looking at the chart above, TRTN's low point in its 52 week range is $28.20 per share, with $38.45 as the 52 week high point - that compares with a last trade of $32.94.
